Hereâ€™s a list on how to avoid cravings and how to avoid binging as well as burning some calories too. ğŸŒ» Water. Learn to love it. It will solve your appetite issues like none else. If you feel the need to binge/eat
column2: ask yourself: Have you had enough water today? I usually aim for 4 liters a day
column3: but normally people should drink at least 2 liters a day. First
column4: chug a glass of ice cold water and then sip on warmer/room temp water to keep you full. Your body will also burn calories warming the cold water
column5: so thatâ€™s a plus. Feel free to garnish your water intake with lemon
column8: and mint. All are great for you! ğŸŒ» Identify your binge patterns. Try to find when you falter most. Remaining conscious about it the entire time duration is a big help in preventing snacking.  ğŸŒ» Count backwards from your current weight to your goal weight. For each number
column9: list a reason you want to change yourself. By the time you finish
column10: youâ€™ll probably find your hunger has subsided. ğŸŒ» Basically keep yourself occupied. (Listed below.) ğŸŒ» Do a new exercise or yoga position. Work on perfecting that for at least 30 minutes. ğŸŒ» Paint/do your nails. ğŸŒ» Make a cup of tea
column11: no sugar or dairy.(Peppermint/green tea help curb cravings.) Really savour the smell
column12: the warmth. Take your time enjoying it.  ğŸŒ» Take a cold shower. Cold showers burn calories. ğŸŒ» While you shower
column15: wash your face. The longer youâ€™re in there
column16: the more calories you burn. ğŸŒ» Play with your pet. Take them on a walk.  ğŸŒ» Clean. Your room
column20: anywhere. Really get in there and scrub. Cleaning burns calories.  ğŸŒ» Watch a new show on Netflix. For every episode
column21: do 2x the episode number of sit ups and pushups to stay active. ğŸŒ» Do an hour of silent meditation. I recommend earphones and a background soundtrack of Tibetan Singing Bowls. ğŸŒ» Make art if thatâ€™s your thing.  ğŸŒ» Read 50 pages of a new book. Drink water/tea while doing so. ğŸŒ» If itâ€™s sunny where you are
column22: sunbathe and listen to music or a podcast. I recommend Welcome to Night Vale. ğŸŒ» Call your grandma. See how she has been. Give her your time. ğŸŒ» Go for a drive. Bring a friend. ğŸŒ» Still hungry? Chew on ice. It helps kill cravings by tricking your stomach. ğŸŒ» Re-do your hair and makeup. ğŸŒ» Take a nap. ğŸŒ» Go online and watch lecture segments from the open courses Yale offers. ğŸŒ» Plan your next 5 meals. ğŸŒ» Plan your next fasting period. ğŸŒ» Write/start a journal. ğŸŒ» Look at thinspo
column25: etc. ğŸŒ» Make one of these lists. ğŸŒ» Look at some nature scenery in your life (yard

column29: remember the sounds. ğŸŒ» Identify all of your problem areas. Record these. ğŸŒ» Renew your goals. These are just some that I practice daily. Feel free to add!! And good luck!" False text
